item.title: September 2022 Build Update
item.description: A September build update Hello Spring! Working almost every weekend, these last two months we’ve actually got a proper build update ðŸ˜„. Table Of Contents What we’ve done Highlights Challenges What’s next? What we’ve done We went through our stash of 90x45mm lengths and picked out roof rafters. These have been measured down to a 20 degree angle and some have been cut to size! We’ve been doing this in the garage when there has been a rain shower break and it has worked quite well.
